Dear Muhannad,
I hope this message finds you well.
I am writing to seek your assistance regarding a critical payment issue with Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf BSC - Dubai Branch) with Hive reference R304985.

Dear Muhannad,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am writing to seek your assistance regarding a critical payment issue with Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf BSC - Dubai Branch) with Hive reference R304985.

I would not be pushing this much if it was not really urgent. The invoice has already been booked, and the urgency of the matter has been clearly communicated. Regardless, despite several follow-ups, the transfer request has not yet been made.

Details:

*	Hive Reference: R304985
*	Insurer: Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf BSC - Dubai Branch)
*	Amount: AED 181,979.38
*	Invoice ID: 94DN4164543

Our account with the insurer remains blocked pending this payment. I would greatly appreciate it if you could support by ensuring that the payment request is raised at least to the bank by COB tomorrow.

I have copied our brokers in this communication to assist in expediting the removal of the block promptly once the payment request has been initiated and confirmed.

Thank you in advance for your support on this matter.

Thank You & Best Regards,
Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
